note: This data is measured in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices to adjust for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
title: Average shortfall from a poverty line of $30 a day (before tax)
subtitle: This is the amount of money that would be theoretically needed to lift the incomes of all people in poverty up to $30 per day, averaged across the population in poverty. Income here is measured before taxes and benefits.
